headline: Is Tutor Perini Still Worth a Look After 150% Rally and New Contracts in 2025?
summary: Thinking about investing in Tutor Perini? Let’s dig into whether the stock’s current price truly offers value, or if the market’s excitement is already included in the price. After a huge rally this year with the share price up 150.3% year-to-date and an incredible 106.0% jump over the past twelve months, Tutor Perini has quickly become a hot topic among growth-focused investors. However, the stock has pulled back 5.8% over the last month. Much of the recent buzz stems from new contract...

headline: Will New Dividend and $200M Buyback Shift Tutor Perini's (TPC) Investment Narrative?
summary: On November 18, 2025, Tutor Perini Corporation announced the initiation of a US$0.06 per share quarterly cash dividend, with the first payment scheduled for December 23, 2025, and authorized a US$200 million share repurchase program. These capital return measures follow record operating cash flow and a record backlog, highlighting management’s confidence in the company’s ongoing business momentum and financial strength. We’ll explore how the new cash dividend and sizeable buyback program...
